data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Anetan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anetan, Nauru
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Anetan, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Anetan, Nauru to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 600 people living in Anetan, Nauru. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 76 believers living in the state of Anetan. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Anetan, Nauru.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Anetan, Nauru so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
